function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Presence of infective organisms on metal surfaces and in aerosols","Impact":"Spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Regular disinfection of metal surfaces and proper ventilation to reduce aerosol transmission","Technologies":"Use of disinfectants and air purifiers","People":"General public, healthcare workers","Owner":"Individuals, building owners, healthcare facilities"},{"Description":"Reduced infectivity of COVID-19 virus in aerosols over time","Impact":"Potential decrease in transmission risk","Mitigation":"Regular disinfection of metal surfaces and maintenance of social distancing","Technologies":"Air purifiers, disinfectants, contactless systems","People":"General public, healthcare workers","Owner":"Individuals, building owners, healthcare facilities"},{"Description":"Use of various chemical substances in sanitisers and disinfectants","Impact":"Health risks from exposure to chemicals","Mitigation":"Use of safer alternative disinfectants, proper ventilation when using chemical disinfectants","Technologies":"Safer disinfectants, air purifiers","People":"General public, healthcare workers","Owner":"Individuals, healthcare facilities"}]}
